amendment.description: An amendment numbered 125 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds from being used to implement, administer, apply, enforce, or carry out any plastic straw prohibitions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rose amendment (A075) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rose amendment (A075) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rose amendment (A075) Agreed to by voice vote.
